title: Clear noon, moderate-speed city driving with 7 braking events.
caption: The ego vehicle drives down a busy city street, following a red car and changing lanes.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 3 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (clearNoon). The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed (average speed â‰ˆ 7.6 m/s). There are 7 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The road is a wide, straight city street with tall buildings on both sides. There are several other cars on the road, including a red car that the ego vehicle is following. The weather is clear and sunny, with no visible obstacles or pedestrians. There are several traffic lights and stop signs along the road, all of which are visible and in working order.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed, following the red car ahead. It occasionally changes lanes to pass slower vehicles or avoid obstacles. The driver is cautious and attentive, braking early for any potential hazards. The weather is clear, which allows for good visibility and easy navigation of the city streets. Overall, it is a typical day of driving in a busy urban environment.
